name: stable-mulch
effect: Used on a patch of soil : Fully-grown plant will last 25% longer before dying and possibly regrowing.
short_effect: Berries stay on the plant for longer than their usual time.

flavor_text.black-white: A fertilizer to be spread on soft soil in regions where Berries are grown. A maniac will buy it for a high price.
flavor_text.black-2-white-2: A fertilizer to be spread on soft soil in regions where Berries are grown. A maniac will buy it for a high price.
